entry.title: ChristianChiarulli/bookmark.nvim
entry.summary:
Bookmark and jump between lines in the current file

ðŸ“š bookmark.nvim

Bookmark and jump between lines in the current file

Install

"ChristianChiarulli/bookmark.nvim"
"kkharji/sqlite.lua"

Setup

require("bookmark").setup {
  sign = "îª¥",
  highlight = "Function",
}

Commands

BookmarkToggle
BookmarkNext
BookmarkPrev
BookmarkList
BookmarkClear
BookmarkClearProject

  • parameter on create for character
